def_en: You use so-and-so instead of a word, expression, or name when you are talking generally rather than giving a specific example of a particular thing.

def_cn: 讨厌鬼，笨蛋(用以代替脏字眼)
def_en: People sometimes refer to another person as a so-and-so when they are annoyed with them or think that they are foolish. People often use so-and-so in order to avoid using a swear word.
